newsitem.title: USA: Texas/w Okla feedlot cattle quiet, no trade - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Texas/w Okla feedlot cattle quiet, no trade - USDA.

text.p: Trade was at a standstill in the Panhandle area Monday, USDA said. Slaughter steers and heifers were not tested.

Feedlots reporting limited inquiry from buyers. There were 1,400 head confirmed for the week to date. The last established price was $64.00 per cwt on Friday. Monday's packer bids were $62.00-$63.00, with asking prices $65.00-$66.00.
Confirmed - None Week Ago - None Year Ago - None
Wk to Date - 1,400 Week Ago - 1,700 Year Ago - 6,800
